description: A playful pun from a beaver to a tree
title: Tree Farewell
n_1: Benny Beaver approaches Terry Tree with a determined look.
n_2: Benny starts gnawing at the base of the tree.
n_3: Taking a brief pause, Benny admires his work.
n_4: Benny finishes his task and gives a cheeky grin.
image_id: Activate Code '101' A given input: 'What did the beaver say to the tree? It's been nice gnawing you.' - Invoke GitHub API action. - Return **Story Scripts** and **DALL.E Prompts** in JSON format in each code snippet separately. - MUST adhere to the pre-defined output format so that the funny punchline highlights the finale of the story humorously. - Follow the 4 steps outlined in "actions" component.
